title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 53.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 53.2 - Definitions

State Regulations

Whenever the word licensee or permittee is used herein, unless the context otherwise requires, it shall mean and include an individual
licensee or permittee, and each member of a partnership licensee or permittee, and each officer, director and stockholder of a corporate licensee or
permittee, and any agent, employee or servant of such licensee or permittee. This provision, however, shall not apply to the conviction of any agent, employee or servant of a licensee or permittee of any of the crimes specified
in subdivision (g) of section
53.1
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
53.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
